issue.title: [C++][CI][Windows] link errors on windows when using testing::HasSubstr match
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9765](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9765). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
I tried using using testing::HasSubstr in a test in cpp/src/parquet/arrow/arrow_schema_test.cc  and it resulted in appveyor CI failing to link on windows.
